translations: [植]刺，刺尖（thorn 的复数形式）；[植]荆棘

phrs.translation: 麒麟花；荆棘王冠；棘冠星鱼

sentences.sentence: We walked through poison oak and got scratched by thorns.
sentences.translation: 我们从毒栎中穿过，身上被尖刺刮破。

sentences.sentence: Roses will always have thorns but with care they can be avoided.
sentences.translation: 玫瑰总有刺，但是只要小心，还是可以避开刺。

sentences.sentence: Crown of thorns starfish normally live in high population densities.
sentences.translation: 刺冠海星通常生活在聚居的环境中。
